original_title: Slam from the Street: Vol. 1: The Original
overview: Jonathan Hook's scintillating documentary focuses on basketball players who keep it real on inner-city playground courts across America. Catch the action as tournaments from Manhattan to Los Angeles showcase the extreme playing skills from teams such as "1/2 Man 1/2 Amazing," "Anti-Gravity," "Flight" and "The Big Ticket." Better bring your "A-game."
title: Slam from the Street: Vol. 1: The Original
